tweets.text:
This week, the Liberals showed who they stand with - and it's not you.

Instead of increasing penalties for huge corporations that rip you off,
Instead of stopping mergers that give you fewer choices and drive up prices,

Justin Trudeau defended CEO profits over Canadians struggling with high costs.

His team voted against my bill to lower prices - at a time when 1 in 4 Canadians are living at poverty levels.

This is how they're choosing to end this session.

Dental Care. Pharmacare. Childcare. Anti-Scab Legislation.

After decades of broken Liberal promises, the NDP got it done and now millions of Canadians are closer to getting the life-changing services they deserve - with more money in their pockets.

Pierre Poilievre wants to cut and gut health care - and let CEOs off the hook.

With just 24 MPs, we fought to make life more affordable.

Our work isn‚Äôt over ‚Äì we're going to keep fighting.

tweets.text:
Happy Father‚Äôs Day!

My dad‚Äôs story is an inspiration, a rollercoaster of highs and lows.

He taught me to dare and reach for the sky.

In a village in Punjab, he dreamed of becoming a doctor and living abroad ‚Äî and he did it.

He also taught me generosity ‚Äî by always showing genuine joy in sharing whatever he has.

Sending love to all the dads out there today.

tweets.text:
On behalf of all New Democrats, I'm sending warm wishes to Muslims around the world as you celebrate Eid al-Adha with loved ones!

For many, this Eid is a difficult time as a humanitarian crisis continues to unfold in Gaza and Sudan.

Muslim communities will show tremendous generosity to help those in need and gather in prayer hoping for a brighter, peaceful and more just future. 

I join you in that hope. Eid Mubarak!

This attack comes just days after the anniversary of the Islamophobic terror attack that claimed the lives of members of the Afzaal family.

My heart goes out to the family whose home was attacked.

Everyone deserves to feel safe in their community.

The rise in Islamophobia we're seeing is extremely troubling - we must confront it at every instance.
